thread.section_title: Passy Eiffel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A Gem
thread.title_full: A Gem - Review of Passy Eiffel Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: pierrel515
title: A Gem
text: Excellent value and great location. The staff is very friendly and efficient. Rooms in front of the street are very well noise insulated. It's definitly my hotel of choice in Paris. Pay parking garage almost across the street is very convenient if you come by car. A bus station just across the hotel and two metro stations within walking distance.
